actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 568 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 30. Record Vote Number: 113.

Amendment SA 568 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S4662-4665; text: CR S4662) To provide that none of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act may be obligated or expended at a rate higher than the level of the Senate and House of Representative concurrent budget resolution for fiscal year 2012.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 568 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 30. Record Vote Number: 113.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 568 proposed by Senator Vitter.

purpose: To provide that none of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act may be obligated or expended at a rate higher than the level of the Senate and House of Representative concurrent budget resolution for fiscal year 2012.
